user.title: Australian Emergency Services
user.description: Configure emergency incident tracking for your state.

data_description.states: Select which Australian states to monitor for emergency incidents
data_description.state: Select which Australian state to monitor for emergency incidents
data_description.update_interval: How often to poll for new incidents (default: 600 seconds)
data_description.remove_stale: Remove incident entities when they are no longer active, instead of marking them unavailable
data_description.expose_to_assistants: Automatically expose new incident entities to Assist and Google Assistant
data_description.zones: Select Home Assistant zones to filter incidents. Incidents will show which zones they fall within.

data_description.states: Select which Australian states to monitor. Removing a state will also remove its device and entities.
data_description.state: Select which Australian state to monitor
data_description.update_interval: How often to poll for new incidents
data_description.remove_stale: Remove incident entities when no longer active
data_description.expose_to_assistants: Automatically expose new incident entities to Assist and Google Assistant
data_description.zones: Incidents will show which of these zones they fall within

refresh.name: Refresh
refresh.description: Forces an immediate refresh of all incident data from the source.

remove_state.name: Remove State
remove_state.description: Removes the device and all entities for a specific state. Use this to clean up orphaned devices.

state.name: State
state.description: The state code to remove (SA, NSW, VIC, or QLD).
